tuv.seg: If someone dies at work, a special Funeral Grant is available under the Occupational Injuries Benefit scheme
Tá Deontas Speisealta Sochraide ar fáil faoin scéim Sochair Gortuithe Ceirde
To be eligible for this grant, the death must have resulted from:
Chun a bheith i dteideal an deontais seo, caithfidh an bás a bheith mar thoradh ar:
• An accident at work,
• Timpist ag an obair,
• An accident while travelling directly to or from work
• Timpist agus an duine ag taisteal go díreach chuig nó ón obair
The person must have paid a minimum of one week's PRSI
Caithfidh ar a laghad seachtain amháin íocaíochtaí ÁSPC a bheith déanta
This special funeral grant is paid under the Occupational Injuries Benefits scheme instead of the Widowed Person's Bereavement Grant
Íoctar an deontas speiseálta sochraide seo faoin scéim Sochair Gortuithe Ceirde in áit an Deontais Báis do Bhaintreach/ Baintreach Fir nó an Gnáth Dheontas
Special Funeral Grant: €850
Deontas Speisealta Sochraide: €850
To apply download and complete claim form OB 61 (pdf)
Chun d'iarratas a dhéanamh líon isteach Foirm OB 61 (pdf)
To apply you need:
Chun iarratas a dhéanamh beidh gá agat le:
• The original Death Certificate/interim Death Certificate
• Bunchóip den Teastas Báis/Teastas Báis Sealadach
• A copy of the death notice
• Cóip den fógra báis
• A note of the funeral expenses
• Nóta de na costaisí sochraide
